means: 手指头的倒拉刺（指甲旁的逆刺皮）

word_mean: 甲刺，倒刺：甲褶外侧或近端甲上皮的剥裂

sentence.Network_en: I have a hangnail, and my heart is - what?
sentence.Network_cn: 我指甲旁有个肉刺, 我的心 - 什麽?

sentence.Network_en: It's an environment that is and highly exacting: every hangnail a sin, every eye - bag a crime.
sentence.Network_cn: 环境就是这样的严格: 每个手指倒刺都是过失, 每个眼袋都是罪恶.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(62) ... hangman 刽子手 hangnail 倒拉刺 hangnest 悬巢.
英语单词查询 ... [abnormal coldness after spring comes] 倒春寒 [hangnail;agnail] 倒刺 [hang-nail] 倒刺.
指甲构造及组织 - 豆豆的部落格 - Yahoo... ... ●灰指甲 ring worm of the nails ●肉刺 Hangnail ●甲床炎 Onycholysis.
近似字词-新浪字典 ... hangman 绞刑吏,刽子手 hangnail 手指头的倒拉刺 hangout (流氓等的)住处;巢窟.

list.abs: ...无倒刺钩编辑无倒刺钩(non hangnail hook)钓具钩子之一、指在钩尖内侧下端没有全刺的一种钓钩、主要用于钓鲶鱼，鲫鱼等小型鱼类、其特点是在生产制造中不加工倒刺.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: alteration of agnail 'painful swelling around a nail' (from Old English angnægl, denoting a corn on the toe), influenced by hang

means.word_mean: 1. a loose narrow strip of skin near the base of a fingernail; tearing it produces a painful sore that is easily infected
